units.title: Aggregate formation (Day -1)
units.text: 2 × 105 cells per mL on 6-well low-attachment plate 50 μM Y27632
units.rationale: Establishes the initial cell density and Y‑27632 treatment needed for hPSC aggregate formation.

units.title: Mesoderm induction (Day 0)
units.rationale: Activates WNT signaling and BMP4 to drive hPSC aggregates toward mesodermal fate.

units.title: Vascular lineage induction (Day 3)
units.rationale: Promotes differentiation of mesodermal cells into endothelial and pericyte lineages.

units.title: Embedding of cell aggregates (Day 5)
units.text: Vessel sprouting d5 into collagen I–Matrigel matrix (12-well plate) 100 ng/mL VEGF-A, 100 ng/mL FGF-2, 15% FBS
units.rationale: Provides a 3D matrix and growth factors for vascular network formation.

units.title: Gel solidification
units.text: Incubate the plate at 37 °C for 2 h for solidiﬁcation.
units.rationale: Ensures the collagen I–Matrigel matrix polymerizes before adding medium.

units.title: Medium addition for sprouting
units.text: Add prewarmed (37 °C) StemPro-34 SFM complete medium including 15% FBS, 100 ng/mL VEGF-A and 100 ng/mL FGF-2 to induce blood vessel differentiation.
units.rationale: Supplies nutrients and angiogenic cues to support vessel sprouting.

units.title: Medium change schedule
units.text: Change the medium after 3 d and then every other day.
units.rationale: Maintains optimal culture conditions and removes waste products.

units.title: Extraction of blood vessel networks (Day 10)
units.text: vessel organoid self-assembly (12-well plate) ~20 min for 1 well (~50–60 organoids)
units.rationale: Isolates individual vascular networks for downstream analysis or transplantation.

units.title: Transplantation into immunocompromised mice (Day 15)
units.text: Transplant into immuno Box 1 (96-well plate) compromised (NSG) mice
units.rationale: Allows in vivo integration and functional testing of the organoids.

units.title: Fixation of vascular networks for staining
units.text: (i) Carefully aspirate the medium from a well using a P1000 pipette and add 4% paraformaldehyde (PFA) solution in PBS for 20 min at room temperature.
units.rationale: Preserves cellular architecture prior to immunostaining.
